page.title: 06BROUGHTON HALL, BROUGHTON
page.content: BROGHTON ENTERED IN DOMESDAY BOOK 1086 AS HEREBORGESTON. BROUGHTON HALL CIRCA EARLY FOURTEENTH CENTURY, WITH FURTHER ADDITIONS 1637 AND 1926. OWNED BY THE DELVES BROUGHTON FAMILY UNTIL 1914. USAGE SINCE 1952, THE MOTHER HOUSE FRANCISCAN MISSIONARIES OF ST.JOSEPH, HOUSING 35 RETIRED SISTERS AND 3 NOVITIATES ONLY, AS NUMBERS DECREASE DUE TO LACK OF INTEREST. KEEP OWN HOUSE, ATTEND LECTURES, PRAYERS INCLUDED IN WORLD CYCLE, MASS, COMMUNIAL, PRIVATE PRAYER, CHAPEL SELDOM EMPTY. NATIONALITIES BRITISH,IRISH,DUTCH,ITALIAN,GERMAN,PHI LIPPINO.LEISURE,OWN LIBRARY,MOBILE LIBRARY,RADIO,COLOUR TELEVISION,ORGAN,PIANO,HANDICRAFT WORK,CYCLING,WALKING,THE NUNS HABIT WORN AT ALL TIMES,NOW KNEE LENGTH,THE CROSS AND WRIST WATCH ALSO WORN.SERVICES,TELEPHONE,POSTAL,
